Celestial Priest

12 HP, 1 Armor, STR 11, DEX 15, CHA 13, flesh tentacle (d10, Blast)

Summary: An alien priest that needs to absorb flesh from others.

• Flesh-wrangler from the Edge of the Living Stars. Highly intelligent.

• Must continually absorb flesh, or will quickly perish.

• Critical damage: target's body is completely absorbed, fully healing STR.
